title: A letter of Francesco Redi concerning some objections made upon his Observations about vipers written to Monsieur Bourdelot ... and Monsieur Alexander Morus : printed in Italian at Florence, 1670 / now made English ; together with the sequel of New experiments upon vipers, and a dissertation upon their poyson ... written in French by Moyse Charas ; now likewise Englished.
author: Redi, Francesco, 1626-1698.
publisher: Printed by T.R. for John Martyn ...,
notes: Translation of: Lettera di Francesco Redi sopra alcune opposizioni fatte alle sue Osservazioni intorno alle vipere.
"A continuation of the new experiments concerning vipers" (p. [37]-112) has special t.p.
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
